posts.post_content:
I have started to work on a collection of T206 Pirates.  With different backs and poses, I am looking at 170-250 cards.  I know it is a long-term project.  I am trying to stay around VG or better for the common backs.  I am taking what I can get for the tougher backs.

Anyhow, the only pose I am missing is Abbaticchio blue sleeves (and a pesky shortstop).  So, if anyone has one they are willing to part with, shoot me a PM or an email with a scan or description and a price.  Thanks.

[url]http://s3.photobucket.com/albums/y64/JeffAlbertson/T206/[/url]
